name: Kung Pao Prawns Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Kung Pao Prawns Recipe: Clean prawns ½ kg Salt ½ tsp + ½ tsp White pepper ½ + ¼ tsp Egg white 1 Corn flour 1 tbsp + 2 tbsp Oil ¼ cup Chili sauce 2 tbsp heaped Red chili whole 10 â 12 Capsicum (chopped) 1 Spring onion (1 inch pieces) 2 Onion (sliced half inch) 1 Garlic (crushed) 1 tbsp Soya sauce 2 tbsp Ketchup 4 tbsp Stock 1 cup
instructions: Marinate prawns with salt pepper half tsp each, 1 egg white, corn flour 2 tbsp mix well, leave it for 10 min, deep fry prawns till light golden, remove and keep aside Heat oil add garlic, fry for 1 min add vegetables seasons stocks, fried prawns cook till mixture boiling, thicken with corn flour paste and remove.
